reviews.text: the hotel is in the desperate need of re-decoration and renovation.
reviews.title: best holiday!!!!
Horrible weekend
reviews.text: the staff is not the kind you expect in a hotel which calls itself 4 star-most of the times they did not care if you were satisfied or not in all parts of the hotel(restaurant, bar etc)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: our room -a suite sea facing was more than 1 room and a half with low quality furnitures, old and dirty carpet, old and worn out covers-drapes etc, a t.v. old type 14 inches placed high up the wall -you were in the need of binoculars...mini bar was practically a fridge and the bathroom had the least of amenities of questionable quality.
reviews.title: Perfect holidays
